abstract: The subscription offer that the customer redeems outside of your app.
overview:
## Discussion

The system populates this value if the customer redeems a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/OfferType/winBack] offer type outside of your app. Add this offer to the purchase options. For more information and a code example, see the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/supporting-win-back-offers-in-your-app#Handle-win-back-offers-redeemed-outside-of-your-app] section of  [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/supporting-win-back-offers-in-your-app].

# offer

**Instance Property**

The subscription offer that the customer redeems outside of your app.

## Declaration

```swift
let offer: Product.SubscriptionOffer?
```

## Discussion

The system populates this value if the customer redeems a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/OfferType/winBack] offer type outside of your app. Add this offer to the purchase options. For more information and a code example, see the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/supporting-win-back-offers-in-your-app#Handle-win-back-offers-redeemed-outside-of-your-app] section of  [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/supporting-win-back-offers-in-your-app].
title: offer
